Class LibraryItem

java.lang.Object
com.lms.library.model.LibraryItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Book, Journal
public abstract sealed class LibraryItem extends Object permits Book, Journal
Abstract base class representing a library item. Serves as the parent class for all library items like books and journals. This is a sealed class that only permits Book and Journal as subclasses.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joel Silva
See Also:

  • Journal

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable()
      Checks if the library item is available for loan.
      Returns:
      true if the item is available, false otherwise

    • setId

      public void setId(Long id)
      Sets the unique identifier of the library item.
      Parameters:
      id - the new ID to set

    • setAvailable

      public void setAvailable(boolean available)
      Sets the availability status of the library item.
      Parameters:
      available - true to mark as available, false to mark as unavailable

    • getType

      public abstract String getType()
      Gets the type of library item. Must be implemented by subclasses to return their specific type.
      Returns:
      the type of library item as a string
